headline: Why Gartner (IT) Is Up 8.4% After Insider Buying And Accelerated Share Repurchases - And What's Next
summary: In recent days, Gartner has attracted attention as a company director bought 43,300 shares and the firm accelerated share repurchases, while investors weighed AI-related risks to its research subscriptions and softer contract value trends. At the same time, Gartner’s forthcoming inclusion in the iSTOXX MUTB Global ESG Quality 200 index and record buyback activity suggest management is leaning into shareholder returns even as margins and growth expectations come under pressure. We’ll now...
